content.content1: We all love Pimms and lemonade in summer - but here's a great way of making an already excellent tipple, just bit more spicey... Ingredients: 1/2 pt Pimms 50cl absolut vodka Juice of 1/2 lime 1pt traditional lemonade 1/4 pt pressed apple juice 1/4 pt fiery ginger beer handful of pint 8 slices of cucumber 1 apple, cut into 8 pieces teaspoon brown sugar 6 strawberries, sliced Pop into a huge jug with lots of ice. Drink through a straw. Don't forget to eat the yummy bits
